name: Achievement Park
description:
Achievement Park is an adventure game with elements of survival races.
You play for Santa Claus, who must crush the bad guys who will run away from you. At the same time you have to dodge different traps. Save the new year from the bad guys who are trying to spoil it.
The game has a New Year's mood, a lot of fans and beautiful graphics in the low-poly style.

Games Features:
- Low poly graphics
- A large amount of fans
- Santa Claus in the bulldozer
- Differnt types of traps
- Game Score
- Holiday soundtrack
